markdownRemark.html:
👋 I’m Christopher Kade, a Front End developer from Paris, France. I love everything Javascript and enjoy teaching it through code and words.

I’ve been doing web development for over 5 years and enjoy working with technologies such as React, Vue and Node. I put great emphasis on code quality, testing and performance throughout my projects.

I’ve discovered teaching through writing articles and really enjoy it, I’ve kept writing ever since and plan on doing training sessions in the future. 👨‍🏫

I love traveling, cooking, playing music & working on personal projects in my free time. Most of these projects can be found on my Github.

Things I’ve done

My projects & open-source contributions, over on Github.
My articles, right here on my blog and sometimes on dev.to.
My presentations & talks on slides.com.

Contacting me

For any questions, invitations to speak, or requests, feel free to contact me via LinkedIn or Twitter.
